title: BUG WITH MY CLIENT PATCH 7.13
body: So when i log in i cant open loot it just stays frozen when i try to start a game i click Play then select the gamemode i want and when i click confirm my client just freezes and i have to restart it i tried to repair the client more then 1 time i deleted league and download it again nothing works my pc and internet are ok i have like 300 fps and 40 ms so the problem is not there either.

replies.body: Same problem.I reinstalled it like 5 times and tried to FIX it trough the client like 10 times and nothing happens.And usually when i reinstalled the game before that issue on the new client i had to update it IN THE CLIENT(i log in and i wait for the update),but this time every time i reinstall nothing like this happens.It just updates in the launcher and nothing more after that.When i login into the client it writes that the current patch is 7.13.I just hope that we get the solution to this soon.
Iv reinstalled it 4 times and iv played 2-3 games then the same shit
Also,the login time is longer compared to the last time i was able to play the game.
I found out that the same thing is happening to some of my friends.

Eambo recently [made a post ](https://boards.euw.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements-en/9aupEmoP-23-06-17-issues-with-bulgaria-and-surrounding-regions)on the EUNE boards regarding connection issues near Bulgaria and surrounding regions.  There seem to have been a few ISP issues, but if you're impacted by this then hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Our tech team can take a deeper look at your case individually and see if other options can be found.  

In the meantime, go through the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide as well in case the issue might be more local or caused by a block along the way.  Otherwise, we'll see you in a ticket!
